code: const API_KEY="ecc218a8";export async function searchMovies(query){const res=await fetch(`https://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=${API_KEY}&s=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`);return res.json();}export async function getMovieDetail(imdbID){const res=await fetch(`https://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=${API_KEY}&i=${imdbID}&plot=full`);return res.json();}
